Lyda Ross.success: Here's the money I promised. Let's do this again soon!
Lyda Ross.failure: I can't believe this, it's such a mess. I certainly can't pay you for this!

Elias Petters.success: As contracted, your payment is duly enclosed.
Elias Petters.failure: This is most unsatisfactory. I'm afraid I'll have to deny payment.

Isabel Noether.success: A deal is a deal. Here is your payment, delivered in full.
Isabel Noether.failure: This is a disaster! I may have to find myself another rancher. And you surely will not be paid!

Marmaduke Biggs.success: You have performed satisfactorily for now. My hard-earned payment is enclosed.
Marmaduke Biggs.failure: You have utterly failed my expectations. I refuse to pay for this! Surely you can do better.
